items.name: ansi-output
items.title: ANSI Output
items.description: Components for rendering ANSI escape sequences as colored text in notebook outputs. Includes AnsiOutput, AnsiStreamOutput, and AnsiErrorOutput variants.

items.name: image-output
items.title: Image Output
items.description: Component for rendering images in notebook outputs. Handles base64-encoded image data from Jupyter kernels as well as regular URLs. Supports PNG, JPEG, GIF, and WebP.

items.name: html-output
items.title: HTML Output
items.description: Component for rendering HTML content in notebook outputs. Handles pandas DataFrames, rich HTML displays, and basic interactives. Includes unsafe mode for script execution in sandboxed iframes.

items.name: svg-output
items.title: SVG Output
items.description: Component for rendering SVG graphics in notebook outputs. Handles matplotlib figures, diagrams, and other vector graphics with proper scaling.

items.name: markdown-output
items.title: Markdown Output
items.description: Component for rendering Markdown content in notebook outputs. Supports GitHub Flavored Markdown (GFM) with tables, task lists, and syntax-highlighted code blocks.

items.name: json-output
items.title: JSON Output
items.description: Component for rendering JSON data in an interactive, expandable tree view. Useful for inspecting complex data structures and API responses.

items.name: media-router
items.title: Media Router
items.description: MIME type-based output dispatcher that automatically selects the best renderer for Jupyter outputs. Supports custom renderers and priority ordering for platform-specific MIME types.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: A badge component for displaying status, labels, and counts.

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: A button component with multiple variants and sizes.

items.name: button-group
items.title: ButtonGroup
items.description: Group buttons together with merged borders. Includes ButtonGroupSeparator and ButtonGroupText.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: A card component for grouping related content.

items.name: dropdown-menu
items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: A dropdown menu component for displaying a list of actions.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: A text input component with focus and validation states.

items.name: kbd
items.title: Kbd
items.description: A keyboard key component for displaying keyboard shortcuts and hotkeys. Essential for notebook interfaces.

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: A popover component for displaying floating content.

items.name: spinner
items.title: Spinner
items.description: A loading spinner component for indicating async operations like kernel execution and cell running status.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A tooltip component for displaying additional information on hover.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: A tabbed interface component for switching between different views or content panels. Supports horizontal and vertical orientations with default and line variants.

items.name: dialog
items.title: Dialog
items.description: A modal dialog component for confirmations, forms, and focused interactions. Includes overlay, header, footer, and close button.

items.name: sheet
items.title: Sheet
items.description: A slide-out panel component for sidebars, details panels, and mobile navigation. Supports sliding from any edge of the screen.

items.name: cell-header
items.title: CellHeader
items.description: Slot-based header layout for notebook cells with left/right content areas and optional drag support.

items.name: cell-type-button
items.title: CellTypeButton
items.description: Styled buttons for different notebook cell types with color coding. Includes CodeCellButton, MarkdownCellButton, SqlCellButton, and AiCellButton convenience components.

items.name: execution-status
items.title: ExecutionStatus
items.description: A badge component that displays the execution state of a notebook cell. Shows queued, running, or error states.

items.name: play-button
items.title: PlayButton
items.description: Cell execution control button that shows Play, Stop, or Loading states based on execution state. Used in notebook cell toolbars.

items.name: runtime-health-indicator
items.title: RuntimeHealthIndicator
items.description: A visual indicator for kernel connection status. Shows idle, busy, connecting, or disconnected states with color-coded dots. Can display kernel name and optionally function as a button.

items.name: cell-controls
items.title: CellControls
items.description: Cell action menu with source visibility toggle, move controls, and dropdown menu for delete and clear operations.

items.name: cell-container
items.title: CellContainer
items.description: A focus and selection wrapper for notebook cells. Handles focus styling, data-cell-id attribute, and optional drag-and-drop callbacks.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: A visual divider for separating content sections. Supports horizontal and vertical orientations.

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: An accessible label component for form controls. Pairs with inputs, textareas, and other form elements.

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: A multiline text input for longer content. Ideal for code cells, markdown input, and form fields.

items.name: output-area
items.title: OutputArea
items.description: Wrapper component for rendering multiple Jupyter outputs with collapsible state and scroll behavior.

items.name: execution-count
items.title: ExecutionCount
items.description: Displays the classic Jupyter execution count indicator with bracket notation. Shows [ ]: for never executed, [*]: for executing, and [n]: for executed cells.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: A profile picture component with fallback support. Includes Avatar, AvatarImage, AvatarFallback, AvatarBadge, AvatarGroup, and AvatarGroupCount components.

items.name: hover-card
items.title: Hover Card
items.description: A card that appears on hover, useful for displaying additional information about an element without requiring a click.

items.name: command
items.title: Command
items.description: A command palette component for keyboard-driven navigation and actions. Built on cmdk with dialog support.

items.name: empty
items.title: Empty
items.description: Empty state container with slots for icon, title, description, and actions.

items.name: cell-type-selector
items.title: CellTypeSelector
items.description: A dropdown selector for changing cell types in notebook interfaces. Supports filtering available types and displays the current type with color-coded styling.

items.name: collaborator-avatars
items.title: CollaboratorAvatars
items.description: Display avatars of users collaborating on a notebook with overflow handling.

items.name: presence-bookmarks
items.title: PresenceBookmarks
items.description: Shows stacked user avatars indicating who is present on a cell. Displays a HoverCard with user details and a +N overflow indicator when users exceed the limit.

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton
items.description: A placeholder loading component that shows a pulsing animation while content is loading.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: A toggle switch component for boolean settings. Supports default and small sizes.

items.name: slider
items.title: Slider
items.description: A draggable slider component for selecting numeric values within a range. Supports single and range selection.

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: A callout component for displaying important messages. Supports default and destructive variants.

items.name: alert-dialog
items.title: Alert Dialog
items.description: A modal dialog for critical confirmations that require user acknowledgment. Built on Radix UI with accessible focus management.

items.name: codemirror-editor
items.title: CodeMirror Editor
items.description: A CodeMirror 6 editor component for notebook cells with syntax highlighting, key bindings, and language support for Python, Markdown, SQL, HTML, JavaScript, TypeScript, and JSON.

items.name: widget-store
items.title: Widget Store
items.description: Pure React state management for Jupyter widget models. Handles comm_open, comm_msg, and comm_close messages with fine-grained subscriptions via useSyncExternalStore.

items.name: anywidget-view
items.title: AnyWidget View
items.description: React component for rendering anywidget ESM modules with the AFM (AnyWidget Frontend Module) interface. Handles dynamic ESM loading, CSS injection, and two-way state synchronization.
